metadata.dc:author: Pérez-Portabella, Cleofé
Rodríguez Moreno, Teresa
metadata.dc:description: A patient must cover all his/her energetic and non-energetic nutritional needs in a sure manner It is essential to keep a patient inside his/her recommended weight ranges, having a balanced body composition which means he/she is well hydrated and has an adequate muscular and fat mass. The objective is to find a patient's optimum nutritional state.
metadata.dc:title: Nutrición generalidades.
[Nutrition. Generalities].
